pyqt5.stylesheet: /* ========================== TEMA: Dark (Metso Industrial) ========================== */ QMainWindow { background-color: #121212; } QWidget { background-color: #121212; color: #FFFFFF; font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; font-size: 13px; } /* ========== TABS ========== */ QTabWidget::pane { border: 1px solid #3F3F46; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #1E1E1E; } QTabBar::tab { background-color: #2D2D2D; color: #A1A1AA; padding: 12px 20px; border: 1px solid #3F3F46; border-bottom: none; border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-top-right-radius: 4px; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background-color: #1E1E1E; color: #EB2814; border-bottom: 3px solid #EB2814; } /* ========== GROUP BOX ========== */ QGroupBox { background-color: #1E1E1E; border: 1px solid #2D2D2D; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 10px; padding: 15px; } QGroupBox::title { color: #EB2814; subcontrol-origin: margin; subcontrol-position: top left; } /* ========== BUTTONS ========== */ QPushButton { background-color: #EB2814; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 20px; font-weight: 600; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #C11E0F; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #9A180C; } QPushButton[buttonStyle="secondary"] { background-color: transparent; color: #EB2814; border: 2px solid #EB2814; } /* ========== LINE EDIT ========== */ QLineEdit { background-color: #2D2D2D; border: 2px solid #3F3F46; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 12px; color: #FFFFFF; selection-background-color: #EB2814; } QLineEdit:focus { border-color: #EB2814; } /* ========== PROGRESS BAR ========== */ QProgressBar { background-color: #2D2D2D; border: 1px solid #3F3F46; border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF; } QProgressBar::chunk { background-color: #EB2814; } /* ========== SCROLL BAR ========== */ QScrollBar:vertical { background-color: #1E1E1E; width: 10px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical { background-color: #3F3F46; border-radius: 5px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical:hover { background-color: #EB2814; } /* ========== TEXT EDIT (Log Console) ========== */ QTextEdit { background-color: #1E1E1E; color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #3F3F46; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 12px; } /* ========== MENU BAR ========== */ QMenuBar { background-color: #1E1E1E; color: #FFFFFF; border-bottom: 1px solid #2D2D2D; } QMenuBar::item:selected { background-color: #EB2814; }
